de.tud.android.locpairs
Class LocPairs

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      de.tud.android.locpairs.LocPairs

public class LocPairs
extends Activity

LocPairs is the central Activity of the game. The game will be started here and the LocPairsController is registered.
